Class DefaultImageCaptchaEngine

java.lang.Object
  |

        |

All Implemented Interfaces:
CaptchaEngine
Deprecated. since beta 2 : use the ListImageCaptchaEngine instead.

public abstract class DefaultImageCaptchaEngine
extends ImageCaptchaEngine

This is a very simple engine, which is constructed from an array of Factory and randomly return one when the getCaptchaFactory is called

Version:
1.0
Author:
Marc-Antoine Garrigue
